description: Automate the extraction of your codebase context for Large Language Models. This tool scans your project directory, respects .gitignore rules, and formats the output for seamless integration with MCP-compatible clients. Save time and enhance your LLM's context with structured codebase information.

tools.name: dump_codebase_context
tools.description: Recursively reads text files from a specified directory, respecting .gitignore rules and skipping binary files. Concatenates content with file path headers/footers. Supports chunking the output for large codebases.

base_path.description: The absolute path to the project directory to scan.

num_chunks.description: Optional total number of chunks to divide the output into (default: 1).

chunk_index.description: Optional 1-based index of the chunk to return (default: 1). Requires num_chunks > 1.
